title: Whats up with all the bots on the Treeline?
body: I just played 3 games on the Treeline and all of them were ruined by Bots. How do they even get in the game when its a PvP match? Is there anything we can do to prevent them? I've been reporting them when I come across them. What category should they be reported under? In the comments I put Bot/AI to get the point across. If bots are reported enough will Riot do something about it?

replies.body: Yeah, that continues to be a major issue. I don't play on the Treeline, but when I encounter bots in Dominion, the best option seems to be submitting a support ticket outlining what you saw.

Riot [periodically bans bots.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5so1YhEl-bot-bans-incoming) In the meantime, report any bots you see under whatever category fits, and explain in the report comments why you think it's a bot.

I've been pointing this out for about a year now and made several threads. I'm pretty sure nothing ever happens with it because literally every game I play in TT and Dom is more than 50% bots, generally everyone but me.

you can generally tell if its a bot, they run heal ghost i think dont really buy any items, if you check lol nexus during loading you will generally see that they have 0 runes, 0 masteries and 0 wins.

It is bad and a reason why i kinda avoid treeline, i am not sure if the 1 player that is on the enemy team is the one who queues with the bots as it is generally 2 bots and 1 human from what i have seen or if they have been placed with 2 others that happen to be bots i am not sure.

I know if i went into a queue and got placed with 2 bots i would be pissed.

There is a problem that there is not an option to report as a bot but i will always report and put in there that it is a bot, maybe taking note of the summoner names and sending in a ticket to riot support about it may help just an idea.
I'm with you. Been reporting (although there is NO PROPER CATEGORY TO REPORT BOTS) but that's not enough. Something needs to be done on the engineering side (please).

Riot only cares about the LCS and Summoners Rift, there's bots on ARAM and Twisted treeline now.

Dominion was the original bot paradise but it's getting out of hand, they like to boast about the huge player base they have but how much of it is just bots?

Twisted treeline has been bot territory for a year now.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/forumdisplay.php?f=49

Look at all of those threads on the old boards from over a year ago now
